# Files, Data & Practice

## Objectives
- Install/Import packages
- Read and write files
- Work with json data (like spreadsheets)
- Practice previous concepts (functions, classes, dict, etc.) using data

## Topics
- Opening and reading files (.txt or .csv)
- Load a JSON file into Python using the json module
- Work with lists of dictionaries as datasets
- Practice building objects from data, use object in lists, etc.
